price: 60. Markaasuu Fircoon tagey, isuna keenay tabihiisii, markaas yimid.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā fir'ʿawnu fajamaʿa kaydahu thumma atā
